title: What is the song that you never thought would stick in your head, but it did? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song that we used to sing in primary school in the morning before class with my grade 3 teacher Mrs Maber. Good morning, good morning, how are you this morning, we will work and play and have a good day, but first we will say good morning. She was a great teacher, I only knew her for a little while, she died 2 years later.
The song from 60's tv show, Flipper, and when some just says the word flipper, I think of that song for over a damn week.
